data.fullContent: Marius Petipa was one of the most influential ballet choreographers of all time. His revivals of some older works helped cement their standing in the enduring ballet repertoire. Several of his pieces survive to this day, in some cases even when the ballets they belong to have been lost to obscurity. His long-lasting influence has truly shaped modern ballet.
data.answer: 佩蒂帕是有史以来最有影响力的芭蕾舞编舞家之一。他对一些古老作品的复兴帮助巩固了它们在芭蕾剧目中的地位。他的几部作品流传至今，有些作品甚至在其所属的芭蕾舞剧因默默无闻而失传时也依然存在。他的长期影响真正塑造了现代芭蕾。
